Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pore-forming peptide ameobapore C (EH-APP; saposin-like protein)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Forms pores in the cytoplasmic membrane of host cells. Implicated in the cytolytic activity of the parasite.

Literature.Title: Amoebapores, a family of membranolytic peptides from cytoplasmic granules of Entamoeba histolytica isolation, primary structure, and pore formation in bacterial cytoplasmic membranes.
Literature.Author: Leippe M, Andrä J, Nickel R, Tannich E, Müller-Eberhard HJ.

Literature.Title: Amoebapores, a family of membranolytic peptides from cytoplasmic granules of Entamoeba histolytica: isolation, primary structure, and pore formation in bacterial cytoplasmic membranes.
Literature.Author: Mueller-Eberhard H.J.,Tannich E.,Nickel R.,Andrae J.,Leippe M.
